001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.util.*;
008import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
009import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
010import java.util.function.Function;
011import java.util.function.Predicate;
012import java.util.function.Supplier;
013
014import javax.annotation.Nullable;
015
016import dev.failsafe.spi.Scheduler;
017
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
021
022import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
023import org.slf4j.event.Level;
024
025/**
026    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
027    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
028    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
029
030    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
031 */
032public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
033    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
034    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
035
036    private URI apiBaseUrl;
037    private boolean useAuthCircuitBreaker;
038    private int authRetries;
039    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
040    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
041    private Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
042    private Supplier<Middleware> correlationIdMiddleware;
043    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
044    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
045    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
046    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
047    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
048    private VrapHttpClient oauthHttpClient;
049    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
050    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
051
052    /**
053     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
054     * @return ClientBuilder instance
055     */
056    public static ClientBuilder of() {
057        return new ClientBuilder();
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
062     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
063     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
064     * @return ClientBuilder instance
065     */
066    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
067        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link ApiHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
072     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
073     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
074     * @return ClientBuilder instance
075     */
076    public static ClientBuilder of(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
077        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
082     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
083     * @return ClientBuilder instance
084     */
085    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
086        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
087    }
088
089    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
090        this.stack = () -> stack;
091        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
092        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
093        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
094        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
095        this.authRetries = 1;
096    }
097
098    private ClientBuilder() {
099        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of().get();
100        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
101        this.stack = stackSupplier();
102        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
103        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
104        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
105        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
106        this.authRetries = 1;
107    }
108
109    private ClientBuilder(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
110        this.httpClient = httpClient;
111        this.oauthHttpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of().get();
112        this.stack = stackSupplier();
113        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
114        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
115        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
116        this.authRetries = 1;
117    }
118
119    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
120        this.httpClient = httpClient;
121        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
122        this.stack = stackSupplier();
123        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
124        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
125        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
126        this.authRetries = 1;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
131     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
132     */
133    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
134        return () -> {
135            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
136            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
137            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
138            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
139            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
140            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
141            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
142            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
143            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
144        };
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
149     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
150     */
151    private Supplier<HandlerStack> oauthHandlerSupplier() {
152        return () -> {
153            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
154            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
155            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
156            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(oauthHttpClient)), middlewareStack);
157        };
158    }
159
160    public ClientBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
161        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
162        return this;
163    }
164
165    public ClientBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
166        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = true;
167        return this;
168    }
169
170    public ClientBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
171        this.authRetries = authRetries;
172        return this;
173    }
174
175    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
176        this.stack = () -> stack;
177        return this;
178    }
179
180    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
181        this.httpClient = httpClient;
182        return this;
183    }
184
185    public ClientBuilder withOAuthHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
186        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
187        return this;
188    }
189
190    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
191        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
192        return this;
193    }
194
195    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
196        this.serializer = serializer;
197        return this;
198    }
199
200    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
201        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
202        return this;
203    }
204
205    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
206        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
207        return this;
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
212     * @param factory
213     * @return
214     */
215    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
216        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
217        return this;
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
222     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
223     * <ul>
224     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
225     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
226     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
227     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
228     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
229     * </ul>
230     * </p>
231     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
232     * @return ClientBuilder instance
233     */
234    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
235        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
236                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
237                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
238                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
239                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
240    }
241
242    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
243        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
244    }
245
246    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
247            final String tokenEndpoint) {
248        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
249    }
250
251    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
252            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
253        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
254            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
255    }
256
257    /**
258     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String)} instead
259     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
260     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
261     * @return client builder
262     */
263    @Deprecated
264    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
265        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
266    }
267
268    /**
269     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String, VrapHttpClient)} instead
270     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
271     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
272     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
273     * @return client builder
274     */
275    @Deprecated
276    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
277            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
278        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
279    }
280
281    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
282        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
283    }
284
285    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
286            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
287        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClientSupplier);
288    }
289
290    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
291            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
292        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
293    }
294
295    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
296            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
297        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
298            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
299    }
300
301    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
302        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
303    }
304
305    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
306            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
307        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
308            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
309    }
310
311    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
312            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
313        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
314            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
315    }
316
317    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
318        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
319    }
320
321    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
322        return withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
323    }
324
325    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
326            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
327        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
328            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
329    }
330
331    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
332            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
333        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
334            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
335    }
336
337    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
338            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
339        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
340            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
341    }
342
343    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
344            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage) {
345        return withAnonymousRefreshFlow(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint, refreshTokenEndpoint, storage,
346            oauthHandlerSupplier());
347    }
348
349    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
350            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
351        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
352            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClientSupplier.get()));
353    }
354
355    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
356            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
357        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
358            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClient));
359    }
360
361    private TokenSupplier createInMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
362        return new InMemoryTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier);
363    }
364
365    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
366            final String anonTokenEndpoint, final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage,
367            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
368        final RefreshFlowTokenSupplier refreshFlowTokenSupplier = createRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials,
369            refreshTokenEndpoint, tokenStorage, httpClient);
370
371        final AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier anonymousFlowTokenSupplier = new AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier(
372            credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), credentials.getScopes(), anonTokenEndpoint,
373            refreshFlowTokenSupplier, httpClient);
374
375        return new TokenStorageSupplier(tokenStorage, anonymousFlowTokenSupplier);
376    }
377
378    private RefreshFlowTokenSupplier createRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
379            final String tokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
380        return new RefreshFlowTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), tokenEndpoint,
381            tokenStorage, httpClient);
382    }
383
384    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
385            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
386        return withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
387    }
388
389    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
390            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
391        return withTokenSupplier(
392            () -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password,
393                tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
394    }
395
396    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
397            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
398        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
399            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
400    }
401
402    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
403            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
404        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
405            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
406    }
407
408    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
409        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
410    }
411
412    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware) {
413        this.errorMiddleware = errorMiddleware;
414        return this;
415    }
416
417    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
418        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get()));
419    }
420
421    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
422        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> errorMiddleware);
423    }
424
425    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(ErrorMiddleware.ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
426        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get(), exceptionMode));
427    }
428
429    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware() {
430        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of());
431    }
432
433    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(final Set<ApiHttpMethod> methods) {
434        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(methods));
435    }

438        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(requestPredicate));
439    }

441    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(final NotFoundExceptionMiddleware exceptionMiddleware) {
442        return addMiddleware(exceptionMiddleware);
443    }

445    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
446        this.retryMiddleware = retryMiddleware;
447        return this;
448    }
449
450    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final RetryRequestMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
451        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
452    }
453
454    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
455        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries));
456    }
457
458    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
459        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes));
460    }
461
462    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
463            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
464        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
465    }
466
467    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
468            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
469            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
470        return withRetryMiddleware(
471            RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
472                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
473    }
474
475    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
476            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
477        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
478    }
479
480    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries) {
481        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries));
482    }
483
484    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
485            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
486        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes));
487    }
488
489    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
490            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
491        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
492    }
493
494    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
495            final long delay, final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes,
496            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
497        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
498            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
499                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
500    }
501

503            final long delay, final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
504        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
505    }
506

508        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries));
509    }

513        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes));
514    }

541    }

548    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
549            final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
550            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
551        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
552            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
553                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
554    }

556    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,

559    }
560
561    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
562        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
563        return this;
564    }
565
566    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
567        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
568    }
569
570    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
571        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> {
572            final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier.get());
573            return OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler, authRetries, useAuthCircuitBreaker);
574        });
575    }
576
577    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
578        return withTokenSupplier(() -> tokenSupplier);
579    }
580
581    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
582        this.internalLoggerMiddleware = internalLoggerMiddleware;
583        return this;
584    }
585
586    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
587        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory));
588    }
589
590    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
591            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent) {
592        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(
593            InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent, deprecationLogEvent));
594    }
595
596    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
597            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent, final Level defaultExceptionLogEvent,
598            final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, Level> exceptionLogEvents) {
599        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent,
600            deprecationLogEvent, defaultExceptionLogEvent, exceptionLogEvents));
601    }
602
603    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
604        return withApiBaseUrl(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
605    }
606
607    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
608        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
609        return this;
610    }
611
612    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
613        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
614    }
615
616    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
617        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
618        return this;
619    }
620
621    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider,
622            final boolean replace) {
623        if (!replace && correlationIdMiddleware != null) {
624            return this;
625        }
626        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
627            correlationIdMiddleware = () -> (request, next) -> {
628                if (request.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID) != null) {
629                    return next.apply(request);
630                }
631                return next.apply(
632                    request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId()));
633            };
634        }
635        return this;
636    }
637
638    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
639        return addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider, true);
640    }
641
642    /**
643     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
644     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
645     * @return ClientBuilder instance
646     */
647    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
648        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
649        return this;
650    }
651
652    /**
653     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
654     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
655     * @return ClientBuilder instance
656     */
657    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
658        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
659        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
660            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
661        }
662        return this;
663    }
664
665    /**
666     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
667     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
668     * @return ClientBuilder instance
669     */
670    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
671        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
672        return this;
673    }
674
675    /**
676     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
677     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
678     * @return ClientBuilder instance
679     */
680    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
681        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
682        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
683            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
684        }
685        return this;
686    }
687
688    public ApiHttpClient build() {
689        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
690            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
691    }
692
693    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
694        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
695        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
696        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
697        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
698        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
699    }
700}
